bibl.title: Ho magikos humnos ston Apollona kai ston Helio (PGM I, humnos II = P II, 81-102, 107-108, 132-140, 163-166).
Sundeipnon. Mél. in hon. Dimitrios Loukatos
bibl.author: Mantziou, Mary

bibl.note: P.G.M. I. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 59 (1988) No. 3299.
